stadium.name: The Stronghold Bailey
stadium.description: The team plays in the central bailey of Stronghold Castle, a massive fortress built on a plateau overlooking the city. The field is packed earth and cobblestone, and the crowd watches from the surrounding stone ramparts.

stats.pregame_ritual: Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Eating a piece of honeycomb to 'sweeten' their victory.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Tying a red string around their pinky finger.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.

stadium.name: The South Pole Palisade
stadium.description: A crude, fortified playing field built from rough-hewn logs. It's less a stadium and more a stockade against the wilderness. The 'grass' is mostly frozen mud and straw.

stats.pregame_ritual: Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Turning their helmet around three times before putting it on.
Licking a whetstone.

preGame:
## üéôÔ∏è HELLO OUT THERE IN TROLLBALL LAND! 

Gather 'round your crystal balls and arcane receivers, because Tuesday Night Trollball is coming to you live from the magnificent **Stronghold Bailey**! I‚Äôm your announcer, Nok the Corrupter, formerly of the Demon Prison and currently your favorite voice of violence! We are kicking off the playoffs with a real humdinger of a series! It‚Äôs Game 1 of a Best of 3, and the stakes are higher than a Harpy's nest! The winner moves one step closer to glory, and the loser starts looking at the bracket of shame!

Today, the **New Ravenfall Commanders** host those frost-bitten brawlers from the south, **The South Pole Yetis**! The atmosphere here at the Bailey is electric! You can hear the 'Castle Echo' ringing through the ramparts as the fans‚Äîand there are plenty of them for the home team‚Äîscream for blood! I saw **Theis Loredo** earlier sharing a piece of fermented fish with her teammates; if the smell doesn't kill the Yetis, her Claymore surely will! On the other side, **Udela Dorkus** was seen licking a whetstone like it was a lollipop! That‚Äôs the kind of grit we love to see in the postseason! 

While the Commanders are looking like the darlings of the crowd‚Äîprobably because they hang around with that letter-hating stick-in-the-mud Sir Tanos‚Äîthe Yetis are here to spoil the party! **Sayers Erdda** has their boots polished with bacon grease and is ready to slide right through the defense! It‚Äôs playoff Trollball, folks! It‚Äôs brutal, it‚Äôs beautiful, and it starts NOW!
postGame:
## üèÜ COMMANDERS CRUSH THE YETIS IN GAME ONE BLOWOUT! 

**FINAL SCORE: New Ravenfall Commanders 4 - The South Pole Yetis 0**

What a display of sheer dominance and delightful carnage at the Stronghold Bailey! The Commanders defended their home turf with the ferocity of a starving manticore, leaving the South Pole Yetis frozen in their tracks! This wasn't just a game, folks; it was a systematic dismantling of southern hopes! 

Things got off to a roaring start when **Theis Loredo** scooped up the troll head right in the center of the pitch! The 'Cobblestone Pitch' didn't seem to bother her one bit, even with the echoes of the crowd bouncing off the stone walls! The violence started early, too! **Croteau Osmo** absolutely leveled **Duky Orelee**, sending him to the sidelines for a medical miracle from the healers! 

But the Yetis weren't going down without a scrap! **Udela Dorkus** showed why she‚Äôs one of the toughest in the league, tackling **Estes Adrian** so hard it nearly knocked the honeycomb right out of his mouth! She didn't stop there, later putting the hurt on **Rhett Gavrilla**! It‚Äôs that kind of 'playoff spirit' that makes me glad I was let out of that prison! 

Our first score came from the golden toe of **Jessalin Zobias**! After a quick tug of the earlobe for luck, he launched a magnificent shot from center field that sailed right through the basket! 2 points on the board just like that! The Commanders' fans went wild on the ramparts, probably loud enough to wake up Lord Orzalon himself! 

Just when the Yetis thought they had a chance, **Sayers Erdda** threw a pass so wild it looked like they were aiming for a ghost! **Rhett Gavrilla** snagged it out of the air for a beautiful interception! You could see the frustration on the Yetis' faces‚Äîor maybe that was just the bacon grease dripping into their eyes! 

At halftime, the healers **Hooge Imtiaz** and **Seiter Aida** were busier than a one-armed goblin in a gold mine! Every injured player was patched up and shoved back onto the cobblestones for more punishment. I love this game! No rest for the weary, and certainly no mercy for the weak!

In the second half, the Commanders really turned up the heat! **Fleme Alis** went on a tear, tackling **Coussoule Bidle** right out of his boots! Even though Alis missed a shot later, the pressure was relentless. The Yetis tried to respond, but **Ajit Serge** and **Sale Tocci** just couldn't find their rhythm, dropping passes like they were covered in slick southern ice!

Then came the highlight of the night! **Pirozzo Opal** and **Jozef Pepe** decided it was open season on Yetis! Opal sent **Sayers Erdda** to the dirt, and Pepe delivered a crushing blow to **Sale Tocci**! I haven't seen this much beautiful carnage since Sir Tanos tried to read a map! It was a masterpiece of defensive brutality!

To put the nail in the coffin, **Estes Adrian** recovered a loose ball and fired another shot from center field! Swish! Another 2 points for the Commanders, bringing the total to a commanding 4-0! The Yetis looked like they wanted to retreat back to their frozen Palisade right then and there!

So, the New Ravenfall Commanders take a 1-0 lead in this Best of 3 series! They looked like the heroes Sir Tanos wishes he could be‚Äîactually winning something without whining about 'cursed swords'! The South Pole Yetis better find a way to warm up their offense, or they'll be heading to the loser's bracket faster than a falling star! Stay tuned for Game 2, fans! It‚Äôs going to be a bloodbath! üèàüíÄ
